para.text: For those switching from version 7.0, there is a list of all the main innovations in sPlan 8.0:

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: New graphics engine

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: sPlan 8.0 now uses the modern Windows graphics engine (Direct2D). This results in a much better and also a considerably faster graphic output. Now you can zoom and navigate smoothly and smoothly even in more complex drawings, which makes working with sPlan much more convenient.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: High resolution monitor support (high DPI scaling)

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: sPlan 8.0 now directly supports scaling on high-resolution monitors. sPlan adopts the scaling set in the Windows system and scales itself to it.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Properties panel

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: With the new properties panel on the right edge of the window, all properties of elements can now be changed or viewed directly at any time. It is no longer necessary to call up a dialog by double-clicking. Any changes to a property are also immediately visible on your drawing. In this way you work even more effectively and intuitively.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: New component library

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: The newly revised component library is now multi-level (with sub-categories). This allows the library to be sorted in a much more structured and clear manner. The entire library can now be backed up or a backup can be restored at the push of a button.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Unicode

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: sPlan now supports the full Unicode character set. This means that sPlan can display all characters, such as Greek letters or special mathematical characters.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Numeric entry

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Size specifications of individual elements such as circles or rectangles or position specifications can now also be specified numerically directly in the properties if required.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: New component lists

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Component lists can now be defined more precisely. In addition, if desired, component lists can be inserted directly into your page in a kind of table.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Table of Contents

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: If desired, a table of contents can be inserted directly into your drawing as a kind of table.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Angle snap when drawing lines

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: This function allows the lines to snap into place at 45 ° angles when drawing or editing. This enables you to automatically and intuitively create precisely aligned connections, even outside the set snap grid.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Bitmap functions

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: The resolution (dpi) of inserted bitmaps can now also be adjusted (reduced) directly in sPlan. A reasonable reduction can save a lot of storage space. There is also a bitmap explorer with which you can list all the bitmaps inserted in a project. This enables you to track down unnecessary "memory hogs".

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Text links / page references

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: There are now some new variables for automated designations available for creating text links or page references.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Conversions line <> polygon

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Each line can now be converted into a polygon and each polygon can be converted into a line. That sounds unspectacular at first, but it is a very valuable aid for a lot of drawing work.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Hatching

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: sPlan 8.0 now uses its own hatching technique to fill elements. Hatching can now also be precisely defined with line width and line spacing. This new technique also eliminates any problems with hatching when printing.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Freehand lines

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: A new drawing mode allows you to easily draw freehand lines.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Page list

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: A new optional vertical page list makes it easier to navigate through the pages, especially for very large projects with more than 20 pages.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Hotkeys for the drawing modes

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: With the (editable) hotkeys for the individual drawing modes, you can switch between the modes even faster if necessary.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Full screen mode

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: With the full screen mode you can display your drawing in full format without any window frames or other elements on the entire monitor. This can be particularly useful for presentations.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
